idea:
HEATING JACKET A PORTABLE AND ATTACHABLE HEATING ELEMENTS FITTED IN ANY JACKET WITH TEMPERATURE CONTROLLER (Specially Designed for Military  in Siachen Glaciers  & Leh Ladakh)


FIELDS OF THE INVENTION: -

The present invention relates to the electronic field, more particularly relates to heating Element Pads fitted within a Jacket.

BACKGROUND OF THE INVENTION: -

This invention relates generally to detachable and portable lightweight heating insulations which can be fitted in a jacket to provide warmness in a cold and comfort to the user in high cold regions. Currently, heating elements are used to provide comfort for the user and keep your body warm.


Conventionally heating pads fitted within a jacket the heat created inside cannot flow outside. To obviate this problem various attempts have been made. These heating elements run on a power bank of a minimum of 2000 mAH and a maximum of a high mAh power bank, but it is recommended to use a 10,000 mAH power bank. The heating can be adjusted by pressing the switch, three heating levels which can be adjusted accordingly as per requirement for user


a. Heating elements consists of 6 to 8 heating pads interconnected with each other through a mesh of wire with a junction in between


b. A programmed electronic circuit with SMD electronic components


c. A USB cord which can be attached to any power bank


d. Power bank which is also not designed, only the heating elements and switch controller is designed, so power can be used to heat the element and can be placed in heating jackets since the whole design is made to be operated on any ordinary power bank, there was no need to redesign a power bank


FEATURES OF THE PRODUCT: -

Six Heating Zones

Portable Power Bank Operated (12 Volt)

Three Heating Levels

Long Duration Up to 8 Hours

Light Weight Insulation

Water-Wind Resistant

Machine Washable

Embedded into Any Jacket

Can be workable in -50 degree Temperature


Application -

Military Individuals 

People Living in highly Cold Areas
name: Spark Invention

idea:
What first comes to your mind when you think about parking? Difficult to find, right? Nowadays one of the major challenges we are facing is the lack of parking space. Yes, in India only the vehicles have increased, and the parking spaces in cities have remained the same. ‘Parking’ or ‘No Parking’ boards we found almost everywhere, which has been followed by few people and ignored by few. Searching a spot for parking is a major issue and for most of the people, it has become a headache of daily life. The numbers of cars we see on roads have been increasing everyday and as a result, nobody gets the space for parking. Searching parking spot is frustrating, which literally wastes our time and energy. In order to resolve such issues, Parokomate brings smart parking solutions.

Smart parking provides several solutions that include in-ground Smart Parking sensors, cameras or counting sensors. These devices are usually embedded into parking spots or positioned next to them to detect whether parking bays are free or occupied. Hence, smart parking has become the necessity of the society. Fortunately, modern technologies offer smart parking innovations that will help 44% of drivers reduce their stress and potentially save millions of barrels of oil.  For Parking Solutions & Analytics Parkomate presents a Smart Parking, that is a change in the way parking problems are defined and potential solutions are evaluated. Smart parking by Parkomate will effectively help parking owners to manage the parking space by maintaining a count of incoming and outgoing of vehicles, analyze availability of parking space, and provide support for peak hours and minimize the risk of vehicle damage and under-utilization of space. Parkomate will bring an innovative parking solution that uses modern technology for optimum use of available resources to achieve faster, easier, and denser parking of vehicles. It helps efficient tracking of the nearest available and convenient parking space for your vehicle with minimum human intervention and therefore will save a lot of time, energy and fuel.
name: PARKOMATE SOLUTIONS LIMITED LIABILITY PARTNERSHIP

idea:
ELAP is an Indian brand based in Mumbai which deals in consumer electronics. The company was founded in 2019 by Kunal Dayaramani, an IT Engineer who has always been an audiophile. Having the entrepreneurial bug bite, he somewhere realised the imbalance between quality of products available with the price point which lead to thought of coming up with good quality and affordable audio products.

From Ergonomic design to the perfect balance of bass and soothing audio experience, ELAP products are designed to provide the best experience.

The key focus has always been to deliver an exceptional quality for those who are always on the move and prefer the best quality.

Positioning the brand as premium yet affordable and at the same time providing the best in class customer support and after sales experience has helped us gain happy and satisfied early adopters of the products offered by the brand. 

According to a report by Global Market Insights consumer electronics market size surpassed USD 80 billion in 2019 and poised to grow at a CAGR of over 9% between 2020 and 2026
name: Elap Digital
